ComicInfo.Title: Wired
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 5 of the 6-part "Serial Boxes." Grifter and Spartan set a trap to catch the super-powered serial killer who has been ruthlessly murdering people with the Marlowe name. But things don't go as planned, especially when Ladytron butts in ? with apocalyptic results. Meanwhile, Jeremy and Pris recuperate from their injuries.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:21:03. [CVDB76623]
